company.name: Nine Dragon Sports Development Company
company.tagline: Scientific Fitness. Community Energy. Travel Experiences.
footer.note: © {year} Nine Dragon Sports Development Company. All rights reserved.
home.hero.h1: Build strength. Build habits. Explore the world.
home.hero.p: We deliver science-based fitness and personalized sports services, and we curate active travel experiences that help young people reset, connect, and thrive.
home.section1.card1.p: Yoga, martial arts, strength & conditioning, and lifestyle coaching—designed for real results.
home.section1.card2.p: 1-on-1 plans based on your condition and goals, with nutrition guidance and progress tracking.
home.section1.card3.p: Our Japan tour blends culture, leisure, and light activity—perfect for active young travelers.
home.section2.p: We are committed to unleashing everyone's potential through scientific fitness and personalized sports services, making a healthy lifestyle within reach. We aspire to become the leader of the warmest fitness community in China.
home.section3.p: A 10-day route across Osaka–Kyoto–Nara–Hakone–Kamakura–Tokyo, including theme parks, museums, temples, and city landmarks.
about.overview.p1: Nine Dragon Sports Development Company is a sports development brand focused on urban fitness services and lifestyle experiences. We operate with the values of professionalism, inclusiveness, and innovation.
about.overview.p2: Our core services include group classes (e.g., yoga and martial arts), personalized fitness guidance, equipment support with member benefits, and corporate/group collaborations with schools and organizations.
about.overview.mission: Mission: Make scientific fitness accessible, personal, and sustainable—so more people can build long-term healthy habits.
about.overview.vision: Vision: Become China’s warmest fitness community where change begins and vitality spreads.
about.leadership.p: A clear division of responsibilities enables consistent service quality and scalable growth.
lead.ceo.name: Dong Duyan
lead.cfo.name: Dong Xurui
lead.cdo.name: Long Zehua
lead.dmr.name: Du Yuheng
lead.dom.name: Xiang Peiyuan
brand.p1: Centered on the dragon, our mark blends a dynamic S-shaped flow with a bold black-and-white contrast, expressing strength, perseverance, and the mindset of pushing beyond limits.
brand.p2: The mark combines movement and balance, expressing energy, teamwork, and steady progress. It is designed to remain clear and recognizable across digital and print use.
brand.color1: White background for a clean, modern look.
brand.color2: Black for strong contrast and a premium, professional feel.
gallery.p: A glimpse into our destinations, activities, and team culture—selected highlights from our tours, programs, and events.
services.japan.p1: A culture + leisure route designed for young travelers. It balances iconic sites, shopping, and easy walking activities.
services.japan.b1: Osaka: Osaka Castle Park, Tsutenkaku, Shinsaibashi, Universal Studios
services.japan.b2: Kyoto & Nara: Fushimi Inari, Kiyomizu-dera, Kinkaku-ji, Nara Park
services.japan.b3: Tokyo Area: Hakone, Kamakura, Shinjuku, Roppongi, Asakusa, Skytree, Disney
services.programs.p1: We offer diversified classes to cover multiple goals such as fat loss, strength, mobility, and stress relief.
services.programs.b4: Fitness Lectures and Periodic Body Assessments
services.programs.p2: One-on-one coaching includes customized plans, technique support, and basic dietary advice.
services.events.p1: We run community events that make fitness social, consistent, and fun—online and offline.
services.events.b1: Fitness challenges (8–12 weeks) with progress milestones
services.events.b2: Weekend group workouts and city runs
services.events.b4: Seasonal themed travel events (e.g., Japan fitness + culture tour)
why.value.p1: We combine professional training, inclusive community design, and data-informed service delivery—so members stay engaged and see results.
why.value.b3: Fitness + travel experiences for lifestyle motivation
why.value.b4: Tech-enabled insights to optimize training decisions
why.sustain.p1: We integrate sustainability into operations and product design—energy awareness, responsible partnerships, and low-waste event execution.
why.sustain.b1: Promote reusable bottles/towels and reduce single-use plastics at events
why.sustain.b2: Encourage low-carbon mobility choices for local activities
why.sustain.b3: Partner with eco-oriented travel and outdoor providers
why.sustain.b4: Use data to reduce wasted resources (capacity planning, scheduling)
why.partners.p1: We collaborate across the sports and wellness ecosystem to extend our member value and brand credibility.
contact.info.p: Use the details below, or send us a message via the inquiry form.
contact.form.p: Tell us what you need. Clicking “Submit” will open your email app with a pre-filled message to our team.
form.name: Name
services.events.cta_note: CTA: Join our next challenge and invite friends to earn extra sessions.
why.sustain.note: We align sustainability with business performance: less waste, better planning, stronger brand trust.
why.partners.note: Partnership focus: co-branded events, member benefits, and “Fitness + Travel” experiences.
contact.form.sla: We typically respond within 1–2 business days.
services.japan.embedNote: Use the language switcher (top-right) to view this itinerary in English / 中文 / 日本語.
services.japan.fee1: Exchange rate: ticket/meal prices are listed in JPY; the actual cost depends on the daily rate (reference: ¥100 ≈ RMB 5.3).
services.japan.fee2: Out-of-pocket items: lunches and dinners for Days 8–10 are self-paid; estimated total is about RMB 800–1,200 per person.
services.japan.fee3: Transport balance: you may need to top up your ICOCA/Suica card by about ¥500–1,000 depending on usage.
services.japan.fee4: Shopping budget: we recommend reserving about ¥2,000–5,000 for personal purchases (drugstores, electronics, snacks, etc.).
contact.channels.p: Reach us via QQ, phone, or email, or submit the inquiry form and we will respond within 1–2 business days.
about.leadership.intro: Our five-member leadership team covers strategy, finance, product/experience design, marketing, and operations—ensuring both professional delivery and consistent brand quality.
about.overview.story.p1: Nine Dragon Sports Development Company is a sports-and-tourism service provider headquartered in Haikou, Hainan. We design end-to-end experiences that combine travel planning, recreation, and sports-oriented activities.
about.overview.story.p2: We focus on safe, well-organized programs, clear communication, and market-oriented packages (including Japan routes) tailored for students, young professionals, and family groups.
lead.ceo.bio: From Hangzhou, Zhejiang, Dong Duyan is a diligent and responsible leader known for patience, enthusiasm, and strong commitment. She combines mission-driven vision with practical execution, building a positive and efficient team culture. Her leadership style is decisive yet empathetic, driving both corporate results and people development.
lead.ceo.r1: Sets company strategy and long-term direction.
lead.ceo.r2: Coordinates key resources and cross-department execution.
lead.ceo.r3: Builds a motivated, responsible team culture to drive sustainable growth.
lead.cfo.bio: From Binzhou, Shandong, Dong Xurui is a detail‑oriented professional with strong logical thinking and planning ability. She leads budgeting, cost control, and financial analysis to ensure compliant, efficient use of resources, laying a solid foundation for sustainable growth.
lead.cfo.r1: Develops financial strategy and budgeting to support stable growth.
lead.cfo.r2: Manages capital operations and financial reporting for decision support.
lead.cfo.r3: Oversees risk control and ensures transparent, efficient financial processes.
lead.cdo.bio: From Jinan, Shandong, Long Zehua is a data‑driven analyst with strong quantitative skills and a focus on accuracy. He builds evaluation metrics and insight reports from operational and market data, supporting decisions on product design, service quality, and continuous improvement.
lead.cdo.r1: Integrates and analyzes market and operational data for insights.
lead.cdo.r2: Tracks trends and converts complex data into actionable intelligence.
lead.cdo.r3: Supports data-backed decisions to improve efficiency and reduce risk.
lead.dmr.bio: From Haikou, Hainan, Du Yuheng has strong communication and research skills. She organizes customer feedback collection, industry and competitor analysis, and research reporting, turning findings into actionable suggestions for product refinement and marketing decisions.
lead.dmr.r1: Leads customer needs research, industry trend analysis, and competitor study.
lead.dmr.r2: Ensures accurate, in-depth data collection and analysis.
lead.dmr.r3: Turns findings into practical strategies aligned with market changes.
lead.dom.bio: From Hainan, Xiang Peiyuan focuses on branding and growth. He plans and executes marketing campaigns, content, and partnerships, ensuring consistent messaging across channels while improving visibility, engagement, and conversion.
lead.dom.r1: Designs and executes targeted marketing campaigns for brand and services.
lead.dom.r2: Delivers consistent messaging and strengthens brand recognition.
lead.dom.r3: Collaborates across teams to improve visibility, engagement, and growth.
contact.social.p: Scan the QR codes to follow our official updates and contact us.
brand.logo.p1: In Chinese culture, the dragon symbolizes power, resilience, and auspiciousness—aligned with fitness goals of a strong body and a determined will. Its agility also represents improved mobility and athletic performance.
brand.logo.p2: The overall S-shaped streamline echoes the dynamic trajectory of human movement, conveying motion and vitality. The wrapped lines resemble muscle texture and concentrated force, symbolizing sculpted body lines and strength building.
brand.logo.p3: The form subtly suggests the number 9 (longevity and striving for the ultimate) and/or the letter S (Strength; Shape), reinforcing our belief in long-term training and the pursuit of exceptional results.
brand.color.p1: Black is our primary color to communicate strength, professionalism, and composure—key traits in the fitness industry. Its strong visual impact makes the brand easy to remember and recognize across contexts.
brand.color.black: Strength, professionalism, and calm authority; high contrast and memorable.
brand.color.white: Clarity and space; highlights the mark and improves readability.
brand.meaning.li1: Value delivered: With the dragon as our core symbol, we inspire members to build dragon-like strength in body and mind through training, fueling a pursuit of health and power.
brand.meaning.li2: Differentiation: We combine a traditional dragon totem with a modern, athletic sense of motion—distinct from typical fitness visuals—strengthening uniqueness and recall.
brand.meaning.li3: Emotional resonance: As a highly iconic cultural symbol, the dragon evokes the emotion of breaking through limits and surpassing oneself—matching the core experience of fitness.
